title: Irene
creator_credit: RKO Radio Pictures, Imperadio Pictures and Herbert Wilcox
brief_description: Based on American playwright James Montgomery’s book of the same name written in 1919, and a remake of the 1926 silent hit, this romantic musical comedy stars Anna Neagle in the lead role of Irene, a poor young Irish girl working in New York and her subsequent involvement with two wealthy men vying for her affection. Stars Ray Milland, Alan Marshal, Roland Young, Billie Burke.
